          <title>
            <string language="en">Different sources of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschiedliche Lichtquellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Différentes sources de lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fontes de luz diferentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fonti luminose differenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορετικές πηγές φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diversas fuentes de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This bar graph shows the comparative intensities of colours emitted by different kinds of light sources.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sodium lamp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sunlight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Balkendiagramm zeigt die vergleichbaren 
Intensität der Farben, die durch unterschiedliche Arten von 
Lichtquellen ausgestrahlt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme à barres montre les intensités 
comparatives de couleurs émises par différents genres de sources 
lumineuses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico de barra mostra as intensidades 
comparativas das cores emissoras por tipos diferentes de fontes 
claras.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico a strisce mostra le intensità 
comparative dei colori emessi dai generi differenti di fonti di luce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση ράβδων εμφανίζει 
συγκριτικές εντάσεις των χρωμάτων που εκπέμπονται από τα 
διαφορετικά είδη πηγών φωτός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico de barra muestra las intensidades 
comparativas de los colores emitidos por diversas clases de fuentes de
luz.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glühlampe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Natriumlampe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spektrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">spectre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
